input: Craft a respectful letter declining a duel.
output:
My dearest Esteemed,
To accept the challenge of this duel would be to dishonor thee and myself in public eye.
Thou knowest well my heart hath no intent for such mortal conflict. Rather, I must plead that peace prevail in our discourse.
Regrettably, my answer shall stand thus: thou mayest seek a different adversary, for none doth stand more ready than I to avoid this unsightly encounter.
I offer thee this humble apology and respect as best I can when speech itself oft fails to ease the heart's lament.
